critique: The executive order appears to be a legal document detailing the cancellation of a previous order regarding land allocation for the Northwestern Shoshone Indians. It focuses on specific geographical coordinates and technical descriptions. The language is formal and devoid of emotional cues. The primary emotion that this order evokes is sadness due to the cancellation of the land reservation. There is also a hint of disgust and fear. The order does not seem to evoke joy or surprise.
